description: This Java source file defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application. It includes endpoints for greeting, redirecting to Swagger UI documentation, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic backend endpoints: greeting, documentation redirect, health status, and info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message to the client.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Constructs and redirects to the Swagger UI documentation URL based on the incoming request, supporting proxy headers.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns the health status of the application.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Provides information about the running application.
